title: Vertically Integrated Concept Mapping Design for Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical science and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A course for practicing medical professionals to develop the ability to integrate clinical cases with foundational scientific knowledge. Utilizes concept-mapping tools on a smartphone-based LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can conceptually map at least three or more foundational science concepts related to clinical problems.
Learners can enhance the sophistication level of their concept mapping by 20% or more by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can clearly articulate the logic of integrating clinical and foundational sciences in their final project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
